lines: सुदृढीकरण तथा केही नेपाल कानुन संशोधन
नेपालको संविधान अनुकूल बनाउन केही नेपाल ऐनलाई
राष्ट्रिय सञ्चार सेवा योजना अनुरुप सञ्चार संस्थानको स्थापना र गठन गर्न बनेको ऐन
यो ऐन संवत् २०६५ साल जेठ १५ गतेदेखि लागू
सुदृढीकरण तथा केही नेपाल कानून संशोधन गर्ने ऐन २०६६ द्वारा झिकिएको
प्रस्तावना : राष्ट्रिय एकताको सुदृढिकरण तथा आर्थिक विकासको निमित्त राष्ट्रिय सञ्चार सेवा योजना
सञ्चार सेवालाई विभिन्न माध्यमद्वारा सर्वसाधारण जनतालाई सरल सुलभ एवं सुपथ
उपलब्ध गराउन संस्थाहरुको माध्यमद्वारा सञ्चालन गरी सर्वसाधारण जनतालाई समेत सकभर बढी
अवस्थामा   सुधार ल्याई जीवनस्तर उच्च पार्दै लैजानको मात्रामा शरीक गराई तिनीहरुको आर्थिक
लागि त्यस्ता संस्थानका सम्बन्धमा केही आवश्यक कानूनी व्यवस्था गर्न वाञ्छनीय भएकोले

summary: The text discusses various legal amendments related to the telecommunications sector in Nepal, including the Telecommunications Act of 2053 and the establishment of national communication services. It also mentions the National Telecommunications Service Plan and the strengthening of national unity and economic development through improved communication services. The text emphasizes the importance of legal provisions for the functioning of telecommunications institutions and the need for continuous legal amendments to adapt to changing circumstances.

summary: The text discusses the Road Board Act of 2058, with subsequent amendments and regulations related to road maintenance and funding in Nepal. It outlines the establishment and functions of the Road Board, emphasizing transparency and efficiency in road maintenance. The Act was enacted during the reign of King Mahendra, with provisions for public road management and funding. The Board is responsible for ensuring appropriate funding levels for road maintenance and coordinating with relevant authorities.

summary: The text discusses the regulations of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission, 2072 in Nepal, published in the official gazette. It outlines the procedures for investigating human rights violations and the rights of individuals to seek compensation. The regulations also cover the process for filing complaints, conducting investigations, and providing compensation to victims. The document emphasizes the importance of upholding human rights and seeking justice for victims of violations.

summary: The text discusses the provisions of the Criminal Code Act 2070 in Nepal, which allows for the prosecution of offenders according to the law. It also highlights the amendments made to the existing laws related to criminal offenses. The document emphasizes the importance of adhering to the legal framework and conducting legal proceedings in a timely manner. The Criminal Code Act aims to ensure that offenders are held accountable for their actions and receive appropriate punishment as per the law.

summary: The text discusses various legal acts related to social welfare in Nepal, including the Social Welfare Act of 2049, the Strengthening and Amending Act of 2066, and the Amendment Act of 2075. These acts aim to promote overall development, social services, and community welfare in Nepal. They establish guidelines for social organizations and institutions to enhance human welfare, uplift marginalized groups, and coordinate non-governmental social initiatives. The laws emphasize the importance of social service programs and the government's role in implementing them for the benefit of vulnerable populations.
